alert.note: Alert for East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 11:38PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Sioux, southeastern Niobrara, Goshen and northeastern Platte Counties through 1230 AM MDT... At 1137 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Manville to near Guernsey Campground to near Grayrocks Reservoir. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lusk, Guernsey, Lingle, Harrison, Fort Laramie, Manville, Huntley, Prairie Center, Jay Em, Fort Laramie National Historic Site, Grayrocks Reservoir, Guernsey Campground, Rawhide Buttes, Veteran, Hartville, Van Tassell and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
